summary: Cambridge is a city in eastern England, known for its famous university. Located on the River Cam, it has a rich history dating back to the Bronze Age. The University of Cambridge, established in 1209, is among the world's top universities. The city's landmarks include King's College Chapel and the Cambridge University Library. Cambridge is also a center for high-tech industries and has a thriving cultural scene with events like the Strawberry Fair. It is home to two major universities and is famous for being the birthplace of modern football.
title: Cambridge
